title: Why Samsung keeps its flagships boring on purpose
description:
Sponsored by CuriosityStream. Sign up here and get access to Nebula for free with your subscription: https://curiositystream.com/techaltar

 [[[ ABOUT THIS VIDEO ]]]: 



Samsung has lately gotten really conservative with putting new features into their mainstream Flagship series. How come? - The Story Behind, Ep. 66
